name: Land of Calgwin Linux Post-Graphics Update
name_original: Land of Calgwin Linux Post-Graphics Update
description:
1000 YEARS AGO, A WAR HAD BEEN WON BY THE KINGDOM OF DAYLIGHT AND OTHER NEIGHBOURING KINGDOMS AGAINST A LEGION OF CREATURES KNOWN AS THE TWELFTH LEGION INCENDIUM. THEY WERE SUCCESSFULLY DEFEATED THANKS TO THE BRAVE WARRIORS OF CALGWIN. BUT A PROPHECY HAD BEEN FORETOLD THAT THE LEGION WOULD RISE AGAIN, WITH A LEADER TO LEAD THEM.

YOU, AS A TRAINEE OF THE KINGDOM OF DAYLIGHT’S MILITIA, ARE GOING TO TRAIN AND PERFORM MISSIONS TO GET THE FULL ENROLLMENT AS A 1ST COHORT TROOP. IT DEPENDS ON YOU WHAT TYPE OF TROOP YOU CHOOSE TO BE. This is still a work in progress so that the developer can get feedback in order to improve things on the upcoming builds and gradually, The Official Release. Instructive criticism is highly appreciated.
